content: I think I'll try using pecans in the recipe. Do you have any tips on how to store them to keep them fresh for a longer period? I've had issues with nuts going rancid in the past. By the way, I've been experimenting with different types of flours, including gluten-free options, and I made a gluten-free banana bread on January 15th using almond flour and coconut flour. It turned out pretty well!
